title: Game freeze into force restart
body:
So recently, I have been having the same problem over the past 3-4 months about having my game to freeze randomly during ingame which then I cannot CTRL + ALT + DELETE or CTRL + SHIFT + ESC, forcing me to having to restart my computer entirely.

I've done:

* Uninstalling and reinstalling completely
* Repaired the client (initiate full repair)
* Cleaned the dust from my computer and other relevant equipment

Also came across odd encounter with my screen appearing green-blue screen when it happened.

My network is fine (35 ping)
My frames are relatively well (120 fps+)

replies.body:
Ok so recently from further playing the game, most of my games that causes the issues have been somewhere near top side of the map.

Like Mid, Jungle, Bot are completely fine but it's always near top side that my game will then suddenly freeze completely then forcing the restart in which I'm not completely sure why though.

Would be appreciated if someone has an idea about this problem...

Yikes, it almost sounds like your pc might have been crashing if it wouldn't respond to any commands whatsoever. That odd green-blue screen you mentioned is rather concerning too. I'd start by doing some general pc troubleshooting, and also run through this [**FPS guide**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752684-Low-Frame-Rate-FPS-Troubleshooting) to make sure all of your drivers are still functioning correctly.

Well, I have read through the FPS guide and also did pc troubleshooting and I came across with the report of the pc troubleshoot with:

Program Compatibility:
Issues found
- Incompatible application                    DETECTED
- Fix application "League of Legends" COMPLETED

Now I'm just not sure what to do. 

My drivers are up to date.
Other games I play are fine.

I even tried to CTRL + ALT + DELETE
                          ///// + SHIFT + ESC
at that time, it looked like my mouse was moving like small frame by another then freezes completely which then forcing to restart. 

I'll be looking further more into this and try to find out why this happening and perhaps ask my other mates to see if they had a similar issue, and thanks for the advice as well!
